item.description:
Tacos & Tequila at La Verdad

Come join Things To Do Boston at La Verdad on Thursday, December 11th for a fun night of Mexican food and good old fashioned tequila!

"La Verdad is an authentic Mexican restaurant, equipped with a takeout window for the quick bite and a full service dining room, bar, and patio for the full experience. Celebrity Chef Ken Oringer (James Beard award-winner for "Best Chef in New England") recently opened this restaurant on the corner of Lansdown and Ipswich, right behind Fenway Park. All corn tortillas are made daily, by hand in the open kitchen. Stepping through the doors takes you off the streets of Boston and into Tijuana, from the lights and authentic d√©cor to the lounge rhythms escaping from the speakers. Start it off with pitchers or bowls of 100% agave margaritas or shots chased with spicy Sangrita, then enjoy authentic Mexican cuisine created by one of the Northeast's finest chefs."

Menu for the night:

Appetizers: Chips & salsa and grilled corn

1st course
Mexican chopped salad: Tostada topped with romaine lettuce, avocado, pico de gallo, corn, mushrooms, pickled red onions, monetary jack cheese and valentina hot sauce

2nd course
Pollo Pibil: Aciote and sour orange BBQ chicken with pickled red onions

3rd course
Tamales de Oaxaca: Shredded pork Mole Tamales wrapped in a banana leaf served with Garlicky swiss chard

What would great Mexican food be without tequila? Each course will be paired with a different tequila that compliments the dish.


Suggested Attire: Casual/ Business Casual

Directions: Via T -
Take the green line to the Kenmore stop, walk up Brookline Ave and then down Lansdowne St. to the end.

Check their website for driving directions:
http://laverdadtaquer...

Cost: $40.00
Go to Things To Do Boston
Click on Event Calendar and purchase your tickets there!
If you purchase by Friday, December 5th
item.name: Tacos & Tequila at La Verdad
